scripts.test:unit: npm run lint && tape test/**/*.*js | tap-arc
scripts.hydrate: rm -rf test/mock-app/src/plugins/cheatsheet &&  mkdir test/mock-app/src/plugins/cheatsheet &&  cp -r src test/mock-app/src/plugins/cheatsheet/ && cp ./index.js test/mock-app/src/plugins/cheatsheet
scripts.demo: npm run hydrate && cd ./test/mock-app/ && begin dev
